scripts.icons:generate: mkdir -p public/icons && sips -z 16 16 src/assets/app-icon-source.png --out public/icons/favicon-16x16.png && sips -z 32 32 src/assets/app-icon-source.png --out public/icons/favicon-32x32.png && sips -z 180 180 src/assets/app-icon-source.png --out public/icons/apple-touch-icon.png && sips -z 192 192 src/assets/app-icon-source.png --out public/icons/icon-192x192.png && sips -z 512 512 src/assets/app-icon-source.png --out public/icons/icon-512x512.png
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build
